name: Stay here, Mr Broccoli !
description:
Made during  TriJam  #209, Theme : Thin Borders.

Stay Here, Mr. Broccoli !

You were cooking vegetables when a broccoli tried to go away.

You have to keep watch on him and don't let him go.

Use what you prefere :

- ZQSD controls

- WASD controls

- Mouse (Left click = Space / Right click = Escape / Scroll wheel click = Enter)

Try to make Mr. Broccoli stay here as long as possible util he escape.

Have Fun, or not...

PS : Do not hesitate to give me feedbacks and advices. (That's my first TriJam game even if I didn't really did it in 3 hours)
